lyrics.information.text.1: Fill in the fields and click the «Next» button. Follow the step-by-step
lyrics.instruction.html:
Download synced lyrics with LOFT LABEL

This format is often referred to as «karaoke». Each line syncs with the music.
We try to simplified the process of synchronizing the lyrics.Below are the simple steps to create and upload this format:
  1. Go to the «Lyrics» section in your account;
  2. Enter the artist's name as indicated in the title of the track If the track has several artists, specify the names separated by commas. Write down all the names exactly as in your personal account. To avoid mistakes, just copy the name of the artist from your personal account;
  3. Enter the name of the track in the column «Track name». The name must match what is indicated in your personal account. In order not to be mistaken, just copy it;
  4. Enter the track text in the «Lyrics» field. Please consider the following recommendations:
    • Write down all words and lines, even if they are repeated;
    • Insert blank lines only between verses and choruses;
    • Record censored words without «asterisks» if these words are not missing in your track. Example: do not enter «F ***»;
    • Proper names, abbreviations, geographical names, trademarks must be capitalized;
    • Do not use the marks «Introduction», «Choir», «Loss»;
    • Do not write «Chorus», «Chorus 2 times», etc.;
    • Start each line with a capital letter;
    • Do not use commas, periods, or other punctuation marks at the end of lines;
    • Do not enter lines that are too long. Remember, one sentence = one line;
  5. Click next. You will see the image of the player. After pressing the «Play» button, the track will start playing, and you need to mark the lines in the text according to the music by pressing and holding the «Space» key;
  6. Download the TTML file and send it to your manager, indicating the name of the track.
